title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist has nothing to suggest, the file is marked as dirty, even though no changes have been made.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open a file with existing code.
2. Trigger code assist when the cursor is at a valid location.
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirty, even though code assist did not provide any suggestions.
